Name: Frequency of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' followed by 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that proceed to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' after 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities per case
Frequency of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' preceding 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all review-related activities
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases where 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' does not happen

Name: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' that are followed by 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' followed by 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' in the most common process variant
Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities that lead to a manuscript being accepted ('SW-EIC Accept')
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities that occur before 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' in cases that result in 'SW-EIC Major Revision'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' in relation to 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' followed by any activity related to reviewer agreement or disagreement
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities that precede 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' occurs

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' in manuscripts that exceed the plagiarism threshold ('Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded')
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' for cases where activity 'Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' in manuscripts that undergo major revision cycles ('SW–Major Revision due in 1 week', 'SW–Major Revision due in 2 weeks', etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases
